bdi4jade.reasoning

Interface ReasoningStrategy

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BeliefRevisionStrategy, DeliberationFunction, OptionGenerationFunction, PlanSelectionStrategy
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractReasoningStrategy, DefaultBeliefRevisionStrategy, DefaultDeliberationFunction, DefaultOptionGenerationFunction, DefaultPlanSelectionStrategy, UtilityBasedPlanSelectionStrategy

    public interface ReasoningStrategy
    This interface defines methods that should be implemented by all reasoning strategies.
    Author:
    Ingrid Nunes

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setCapability(Capability capability)
      Sets the capability with which this strategy is associated with.

    • Method Detail

      • setCapability

        void setCapability(Capability capability)
        Sets the capability with which this strategy is associated with. If this strategy was previously associated with another capability, this methods throws an IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        capability - the capability to set.
